title: Exploring Mathematical Concepts Using Mobile-Based Rhythmic Gymnastics Movements

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Utilizing mobile devices for safe remote learning during COVID-19. Convergence education integrating rhythmic gymnastics movements with mathematical pattern analysis, ratio calculations, and angle measurements

learning_goals: Learners can express and predict rhythmic gymnastics movement patterns as mathematical sequences
Learners can explain geometric concepts by measuring and analyzing angular changes in gymnastics movements
Learners can connect timing of gymnastics movements with mathematical ratios (e.g., 3:4 rhythm) using mobile apps
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
